title: Merlot Dipping Sauce
directions: Slowly bring the balsamic vinegar, Merlot, garlic, soy sauce, and honey to a boil in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer another 20 to 25 minutes; remove from heat and add the butter to the mixture, stirring to thicken as the butter melts.
ingredients: 4 teaspoons honey, or more to taste
10 tablespoons butter, cut into small chunks
